message: Let's be fair, I'll take 90, and you get 10.  It's a good start.
Alice, your offer was a bit harsh! Let's be reasonable. I propose 70 for me and 30 for you. This accounts for the time value of money -  you'll be losing value with each round that passes.
Okay, Bob, I'm willing to compromise. 60 for me, 40 for you.  Let's get this done before we lose too much money!
Alice, we're getting closer, but your offers aren't factoring in the inflation.  I'll take a slight hit with 65 for me and 35 for you.  Let's wrap this up - time is literally money!
